DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether administration of 150 mg clopidogrel is effective in reducing the one-year incidence of thromboischemic events in patients with high on-clopidogrel platelet reactivity compared to 75 mg clopidogrel after elective percutaneous coronary intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Doubling the Maintenance Dose of Clopidogrel in Patients With High On-Clopidogrel Platelet Reactivity
